com.github.wuic.engine.core

Interface EngineRequestTransformer.RequireEngineRequestTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConverterEngine, CssInspectorEngine, JavascriptInspectorEngine, TextInspectorEngine
    Enclosing class:
    EngineRequestTransformer

    public static interface EngineRequestTransformer.RequireEngineRequestTransformer

    This interface is implemented by Pipe.Transformer which needs a EngineRequest to perform transformation.

    Since:
    0.5.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void transform(InputStream is, OutputStream os, ConvertibleNut nut, EngineRequest request)
      Matches the Pipe.Transformer.transform(java.io.InputStream, java.io.OutputStream, Object) signature with an additional EngineRequest.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        void transform(InputStream is,
             OutputStream os,
             ConvertibleNut nut,
             EngineRequest request)
               throws IOException

        Matches the Pipe.Transformer.transform(java.io.InputStream, java.io.OutputStream, Object) signature with an additional EngineRequest.

        Parameters:
        request - the EngineRequest
        is - the input
        os - the output
        nut - the object that provides the original input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
